title: Infra Continuous Improvement Planner
reason: We need this skill because long-term scale depends on resilient and sustainable infrastructure choices. This specific skill turns findings into sustained upgrade cycles.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Infra Continuous Improvement Planner`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capacity collapse and environmental debt.
Design and version the input/output contract for capacity forecasts, energy usage, and sustainability metrics, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using closed-loop prioritization, and produce improvement roadmaps with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capacity collapse and environmental debt, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
